hero.description: Nurturing your child's growth from infancy to early childhood.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Little Great Minds is dedicated to providing a safe, nurturing, and stimulating environment for children aged 0 to 3 years. Our experienced educators focus on each child's individual needs, fostering creativity, curiosity, and foundational skills that prepare them for a bright future.

infantCare.title: Infant Care (0-1 years)
infantCare.description: Providing a loving and secure environment for your little ones.

toddlerProgram.title: Toddler Program (1-2 years)
toddlerProgram.description: Encouraging exploration and developing essential motor skills.

preschool.title: Preschool (2-3 years)
preschool.description: Fostering a solid foundation for academic and social success.
